mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GameContents(ID, USERID, TITLE, IMAGENAME, IMAGEPATH, SUBSCRIBEDATE, GAMELEVEL, MAXSUBSCRIBERS, CONTENT, CREATEDAT, PRICE, DISCOUNTRATE, DISCOUNTPRICE) VALUES (GAMECONTENTS_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{USERID}, #{TITLE}, #{IMAGENAME}, #{IMAGEPATH}, #{SUBSCRIBEDATE}, #{GAMELEVEL}, #{MAXSUBSCRIBERS}, #{CONTENT} , sysdate, #{PRICE}, #{DISCOUNTRATE}, #{DISCOUNTPRICE} )
